input.Query: SELECT * FROM gtfscontroldb.flowcontroller ORDER BY R_ID DESC LIMIT 1 ;
input.State: 5319fef4-43ae-4bf6-8bc7-912880c4b38aSELECT * FROM gtfscontroldb.flowcontroller ORDER BY R_ID ASC LIMIT 1 ;

data.response: =string.concat("Request added to the Queue with Request ID : ", string.tostring($activity[MySQLQuery].Output.records[0].r_id))

get.description: This will subscribe to real-time TripUpdates and LiveLocations APi's, transform the messages (having tripupdate & live location) and publishes it to the TCM. It also publishes bus msgs that does not posses live TRIP Info but has live location.
